remarks.para: You can include a pipe symbol within the header text to make it a two line header. All columns which share the same text for the first row will show a spanned row for the first header. These columns will also constitute a single group and each group will display its own row total column. If there is no pipe symbol then the text before the pipe is presumed to be .
Adjacent columns which have the same text before the pipe symbol constitute a column group as explained in more detail in .
